tool_description: Extracts current price, product name, and availability from e-commerce product pages using configurable selectors.

currency.description: Expected currency code (USD, EUR, GBP, etc.)

user_agent.description: Custom user agent string for requests

error_messages: Price not found: Unable to locate price information on the page using the provided selector.
Invalid selector: CSS selector syntax is malformed.
Page load failed: Unable to load the product page (network error, blocking, etc.).
Currency mismatch: Found price in different currency than expected.
Price parsing error: Located price element but unable to parse numeric value.
usage: Provide product URL and optionally customize selectors and user agent. The tool attempts automatic detection if selectors are not specified.
